scenario_text.value:
(Hm? It looks like Kunemon is trying to move
closer to Ryo.)

Wh-what do you think you’re doin’? Tryin’ to
eat me? Well, I don’t think so!

Kunemon wouldn’t do that! He was just trying
to cheer you up!

Hmph! Like I’d trust anything a monster would
say!

Don’t you try creepin’ up on me like that
again! You got that?
Now Kunemon’s sad. The poor thing...
Yeah, Ryo didn’t have to be so mean about it.

(I mean, I can understand why Ryo would be
scared, but still...)

(Kunemon is keeping his distance, but looking
out for Ryo. I kinda feel bad for him.)
